name: Tunnel
longDes: The tunnel is dark. You cannot continue without a source of light. The only way is back up through the hole. You notice a small statue with out stretched hands. It appears this once held a valuable object.
shortDes: The tunnel is too dark to continue down. The only way is back up through the hole.

features.name: statue
features.preActionDes: The statue with outstretched hands appears to have once held a valuable object.
features.inActionDes: You place the crystal into the hands of the statue.
features.postActionDes: The tunnel is now illuminated by the glowing crystal.
